channel.title: [317] Dropping and etc
channel.description:
I have constructed a pretty nice server but have come to a few problems..
1. When I drop things they dissapear. 2. I have my character rights set as 3 but it says I'm Co-Owner. 3. I can't seem to find the right login box to change it. 4. I can't seem to find the right scroll bar to change it either. 5. I can't get my server online when I put in my No-Ip Ip in place of '127.0.0.1'. 6. I need help in setting up a voting website for when I get the server online. 7. I am owner and I can't spawn NPC's. Thanks to anyone who helps!! :D

item.title: [317] Dropping and etc
item.dc:creator: @the_pker_nub the pker nub
item.description:
@the_pker_nub wrote:

Some Sources have the Owner rights set as 5.

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Dropping and etc
item.dc:creator: @The_Provoked The Provoked
item.description:
@The_Provoked wrote:

ok, ill try that now. but i have tried it before and it wont let me login… but ill try it again…

yeah, just like i thought. Ok, i change my ip to provokedscape.no-ip.biz in the Client: client.java, gui.java
in the source: client.java, server.java (am i missing anything??)

and when I went to the source compiler, and typed “r” then hit enter, it said server was already in use. when i know its not haha

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Dropping and etc
item.dc:creator: @i0wn3v3ry i0wn3v3ry
item.description:
@i0wn3v3ry wrote:

Yes.

In your client - client.java search for “127.0.0.1” and change to your server ip, and do again, but make sure your making a seperate client, cause 127 is for you, and server ip is for others, Make sure your using your No-Ip address.

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Dropping and etc
item.dc:creator: @The_Provoked The Provoked
item.description:
@The_Provoked wrote:

Thanks a lot guys. I’m just not gonna worry about the background or scroll bar. But the website u gave me says:

The current IP/DNS is: provokedscape.no-ip.biz:43594
Server status: OFFLINE

(not sure if i used the right ip, thats the one for my server.)
(also, as of now, so i can work on my server’s bugs, I have all the ip’s set to 127.0.0.1, so do i have to have all the ip’s set to ’
provokedscape.no-ip.biz in order for it to be online?)

and Idk how to change the ItemDrop or the rank. and if at all possible, i know the co-owner has the same rights as the actual owner, but i would like to have the title as ‘owner’ ;D

P.S. hey! could i use my google page as my voting website? or no?
side note hey thanks so much, I would rep++ you all, but i cant

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Dropping and etc
item.dc:creator: @i0wn3v3ry i0wn3v3ry
item.description:
@i0wn3v3ry wrote:

The Provoked, use this site to see if your server is online/offline.

http://status.blackout-gaming.net/

0=normal player
1=mod/donator
2=admin
3=owner
4=hidden admin

You can re-add rank, such as server support, veteran, server hoe, server fag, and much more, but I’m not sure on those.

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Dropping and etc
item.dc:creator: @Kayceee Kayceee
item.description:
@Kayceee wrote:

Yeah what we are saying is that your DropMethod needs editing so that it shows your items.
Maybe the previous owner deleted the Owner rank. And 4 should be a Hidden Admin.
Recreate a rank if you wish :S But co-owner has the same rights as owner I should imagine.

Changing your client background, just find the .JPG, .JPEG or .GIF File and change it to whatever you want (As long as the dimensions are the same)

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Dropping and etc
item.dc:creator: @The_Provoked The Provoked
item.description:
@The_Provoked wrote:

Ok, I have a few bugs in my server lol im most aprreciative that ur trying to help me. ook, yes i know where to put my new ip but when i do it, it never connects,idk what to do… and my drop method is like, when i drop something, it never appears on the ground. Like 4 is normal player. and what i mean is, i can change the login box to a different image. and the scroll bar to a different bar image.

Read full topic

  6. I need help in setting up a voting website for when I get the server online.

    Thanks to anyone who helps!! :D[/quote]

ok fine, i’ll help.

  1. ItemDrop
  2. Client.java
    3.??
    4.??
  3. Portforward or use utorret - status black out on google to see if its on.
  4. r-l, r-s, extreme100
  5. Client. java or your missing command.

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Dropping and etc
item.dc:creator: @Kayceee Kayceee
item.description:
@Kayceee wrote:

The only thing I can understand is you trying to change your IP from 127.0.0.1, to do this, open your client files and find GUI.java, change it in there, and also in client.java (if it is in there) Use CTRL + F to search through it.

Read full topic
